ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3" Pixim, DPS, WDR. NTSC Signal System. Horizontal Resolution: 690 TV Line
Lens: Built-in 4-9mm varifocal lens with external adjustments zoom and focus
IR illuminators: Built-in 48 infrared LEDs for night vision. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 LUX (IR on)
Built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch. Super WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) operation, ensures brilliant image quality under any lighting environment
OSD (On Screen Display) function menu control buttons make more convenience using. Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Vision Infrared IR Bullet Security Camera 1/3'' Pixim Color CCD 690TVL High Resolution WDR OSD 4-9mm Vari-focal Lens for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System IR738WD M9V
